languages.text: "Я уже говорила, что не в силах контролировать свои способности! Чего еще вы от меня хотите? Может, приставите ко мне парию? Или наденете пси-подавляющие кандалы?"

traits.locale_text: "Я уже говорила, что не в силах контролировать свои способности! Чего еще вы от меня хотите? Может, приставите ко мне парию? Или наденете пси-подавляющие кандалы?". {n}Кассия резко отстраняется, а вы словно вскипаете заживо — и тут же остываете, хватая ртом воздух.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "I already told you I cannot control my abilities! What else do you want from me? Will I be assigned a Pariah chaperone? Or will you put me in suppressing shackles?"
languages.original_text: "Я уже говорила, что не в силах контролировать свои способности! Чего еще вы от меня хотите? Может, приставите ко мне парию? Или наденете пси-подавляющие кандалы?"

traits.locale_text: "I already told you I cannot control my abilities! What else do you want from me? Will I get a Pariah chaperone? Or will you put me in suppressing shackles?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I already told you I cannot control my abilities! What else do you want from me? Will I get a Pariah chaperone? Or will you put me in suppressing shackles?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I already told you I cannot control my abilities! What else do you want from me? Will I be assigned a Pariah chaperone? Or will you put me in suppressing shackles?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I already told you I cannot control my abilities! What else do you want from me? Will I be assigned a Pariah chaperone? Or will you put me in suppressing shackles?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I already told you I cannot control my abilities! What else do you want from me? Will I be assigned a Pariah chaperone? Or will you put me in suppressing shackles?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我已经告诉过你了，我无法控制我的力量！你还想让我做些什么？你要给我分配一名无魂者官员进行陪护吗？还是说，你打算让我戴上镣铐？”
languages.original_text: "I already told you I cannot control my abilities! What else do you want from me? Will I be assigned a Pariah chaperone? Or will you put me in suppressing shackles?"

traits.locale_text: “我已经告诉过你了，我无法控制我的力量！你还想让我做些什么？你要给我分配一名弃民女官进行陪护吗？还是说，你打算让我戴上镣铐？”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¡Ya le he dicho que no puedo controlar mis habilidades! ¿Qué más quiere, asignarme un paria como carabina? ¿Ponerme grilletes de supresión?».
languages.original_text: "I already told you I cannot control my abilities! What else do you want from me? Will I be assigned a Pariah chaperone? Or will you put me in suppressing shackles?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Ya le he dicho que no puedo controlar mis habilidades! ¿Qué más quiere, asignarme un paria como carabina? ¿Ponerme grilletes de supresión?».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「あたくしは自分の能力を制御できないと言ったはずです！他に何を望むのです？パーリアのお目付け役をつけるのですか？それとも、あたくしを抑制する足かせをはめるのですか？」
languages.original_text: "I already told you I cannot control my abilities! What else do you want from me? Will I be assigned a Pariah chaperone? Or will you put me in suppressing shackles?"

traits.locale_text: 「あたくしは自分の能力を制御できないと言ったはずです！他に何を望むのです？パーリアのお目付け役をつけるのですか？それとも、あたくしを抑制する足かせをはめるのですか？」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich habe Euch bereits gesagt, dass ich meine Fähigkeiten nicht kontrollieren kann. Was wollt Ihr denn noch von mir? Wird mir eine Paria-Aufsicht zugeteilt? Oder legt Ihr mich in Unterdrückungsketten?"
languages.original_text: "I already told you I cannot control my abilities! What else do you want from me? Will I be assigned a Pariah chaperone? Or will you put me in suppressing shackles?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe Euch bereits gesagt, dass ich meine Fähigkeiten nicht kontrollieren kann. Was wollt Ihr denn noch von mir? Wird mir eine Paria-Aufsicht zugeteilt? Oder legt Ihr mich in Unterdrückungsketten?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Il me semblait vous avoir déjà dit que je n'ai aucun contrôle sur mes capacités ! Qu'attendez-vous de plus ? Que l'on m'assigne un chaperon de Paria ? Ou que je porte des menottes de répression ? »
languages.original_text: "I already told you I cannot control my abilities! What else do you want from me? Will I be assigned a Pariah chaperone? Or will you put me in suppressing shackles?"

traits.locale_text: « Il me semblait vous avoir déjà dit que je n'ai aucun contrôle sur mes capacités ! Qu'attendez-vous de plus ? Que l'on m'assigne un chaperon de Paria ? Ou que je porte des menottes de répression ? »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Sana yeteneklerimi kontrol edemediğimi daha önce söylemiştim! Benden daha ne istiyorsun? Bana Parya'dan bir refakatçi mi atayacaksın? Yoksa beni zincire mi vuracaksın?"
languages.original_text: "I already told you I cannot control my abilities! What else do you want from me? Will I be assigned a Pariah chaperone? Or will you put me in suppressing shackles?"

traits.locale_text: "Sana yeteneklerimi kontrol edemediğimi daha önce söylemiştim! Benden daha ne istiyorsun? Bana Parya bir refakatçi mi atayacaksın? Yoksa beni zincire mi vuracaksın?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
